metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

4"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Inactive Users (select for filtering)"},"name":"text - 0"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"UserGroupCollection_CL 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend groupfilter = iff(("{GroupSelection}" == "All"), "*", "{GroupSelection}")
| where group_g == "{GroupSelection}" or groupfilter == "*"
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = max_of(lastSignInDateTime_t,lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime_t)
| summarize arg_max(maxof_lastSignInDateTime,*) by upn_s 
| extend timeslot = case(maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(30d), "under 30 days", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(60d), "30 to 60 days", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(90d), "60 to 90 days", "over 90 days")
| extend signinfilterstart = case(maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(30d), "0d", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(60d), "30d", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(90d), "60days", "90d")
| extend signinfilterend = case(maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(30d), "30d", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(60d), "60d", maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(90d), "90days", "99999d")
| summarize count() by timeslot, signinfilterstart, signinfilterend","size":0,"exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"signinfilterstart","parameterName":"selectedsigninfilterstart","parameterType":1,"defaultValue":"0d"},{"fieldName":"signinfilterend","parameterName":"selectedsigninfilterend","parameterType":1,"defaultValue":"99999d"}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"maxof_lastSignInDateTime","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"maxof_lastSignInDateTime","sortOrder":1}],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"timeslot","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","maximumFractionDigits":2,"maximumSignificantDigits":3}}},"showBorder":true,"sortCriteriaField":"signinfilterstart","sortOrderField":1}},"name":"query - 3"}],"exportParameters":true},"customWidth":"15","name":"Auth Method Overview - Copy","styleSettings":{"margin":"10px","padding":"5px","showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Unregistered Users (no Method registered)"},"name":"text - 0"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"//Find Auth Methods for filtered Group of Users
// reference https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationmethods-overview?view=graph-rest-beta#what-authentication-methods-can-be-managed-in-microsoft-graph
let AllUsers =
UserGroupCollection_CL 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by upn_s, AuthMethod_s
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = max_of(lastSignInDateTime_t,lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime_t)
| extend groupfilter = iff(("{GroupSelection}" == "All"), "*", "{GroupSelection}")
| where group_g == "{GroupSelection}" or groupfilter == "*"
| where AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.passwordAuthenticationMethod";
//| distinct upn_s, AuthMethod_s, maxof_lastSignInDateTime, groupfilter, group_g;
let MFAUser = 
UserGroupCollection_CL 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by upn_s, AuthMethod_s
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = max_of(lastSignInDateTime_t,lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime_t)
| extend groupfilter = iff(("{GroupSelection}" == "All"), "*", "{GroupSelection}")
| where group_g == "{GroupSelection}" or groupfilter == "*"
| distinct upn_s, AuthMethod_s
| where AuthMethod_s <> "#microsoft.graph.passwordAuthenticationMethod"
| where AuthMethod_s <> "";
AllUsers
| join kind=leftouter MFAUser on upn_s
| extend ANY = iff(AuthMethod_s1 <> "","registered","unregistered")
| summarize arg_max(maxof_lastSignInDateTime, *) by upn_s  
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = iff(isempty(maxof_lastSignInDateTime), todatetime(ago(91d)),maxof_lastSignInDateTime)
| where maxof_lastSignInDateTime < ago(totimespan({selectedsigninfilterstart})) 
| where maxof_lastSignInDateTime > ago(totimespan({selectedsigninfilterend}))
| distinct upn_s, ANY
| summarize count() by ANY
| render piechart

| project-rename UserPrincipalName = upn_s, GroupName = groupname_s, Status = ANY

let MFAUsers=
UserGroupCollection_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = max_of(lastSignInDateTime_t,lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime_t)

| where group_g == "{GroupSelection}" or groupfilter == "*"
| distinct id_g, upn_s, group_g
| extend UserPrincipalName = tolower(upn_s);
let 2FASignIn=
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where AuthenticationRequirement == "multiFactorAuthentication"
| extend authMethod_ = tostring(MfaDetail.authMethod)
| where authMethod_ != "";
2FASignIn
| join kind=inner MFAUsers on UserPrincipalName
| distinct UserPrincipalName, authMethod_
| summarize count() by authMethod_
| render piechart ","size":3,"title":"Used Secondary Auth Methods ","exportFieldName":"series","exportParameterName":"SelectedSignInMethod","exportDefaultValue":"0","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - Auth Methods by SignIn Overview - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"//Find Auth Methods for filtered Group of Users
let MFAUsers=
UserGroupCollection_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend maxof_lastSignInDateTime = max_of(lastSignInDateTime_t,lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime_t)

| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend authMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| where AppDisplayName == "Windows Sign In"
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, authMethod_;
PWlessSignIn
| join kind=inner MFAUsers on UserPrincipalName
| distinct UserPrincipalName, authMethod_
| summarize count() by authMethod_

| extend UserPrincipalName = tolower(upn_s);
let 2FASignIn=
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where AuthenticationRequirement == "multiFactorAuthentication"
| extend authMethod_ = tostring(MfaDetail.authMethod)
//| where authMethod_ != ""
| where authMethod_ contains "{SelectedSignInMethod}";
2FASignIn
| join kind=inner MFAUsers on UserPrincipalName
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName//, authMethod_;
| project-rename LoginNo = count_ //AuthenticationMethod = authMethod_,
| sort by LoginNo desc

| extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| where authenticationMethod_ == "Password"
| project UserPrincipalName, authenticationMethod_, DeviceDetail, ResultType
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| distinct UserPrincipalName, DeviceName","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10,"filter":true,"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"UserPrincipalName","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"UserPrincipalName","sortOrder":1}]},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 4"}]},"name":"group - 3"}]},"customWidth":"66","name":"Tiles1","styleSettings":{"margin":"5px","padding":"10px","showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"//Find Auth Methods for filtered Group of Users
// reference https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationmethods-overview?view=graph-rest-beta#what-authentication-methods-can-be-managed-in-microsoft-graph
let recurrence = 1d;
UserGroupCollection_CL 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| extend groupfilter = iff(("{GroupSelection}" == "All"), "*", "{GroupSelection}")
| where group_g == "{GroupSelection}" or groupfilter == "*"
| extend length=bin(TimeGenerated, recurrence)
| distinct length, upn_s, AuthMethod_s
| extend WH4B = iff(AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.windowsHelloForBusinessAuthenticationMethod","true","false")
| extend TAP = iff(AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.temporaryAccessPassAuthenticationMethod","true","false")
| extend APP = iff(AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethod","true","false")
| extend SMS = iff(AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.phoneAuthenticationMethod","true","false")
| extend FIDO = iff(AuthMethod_s == "#microsoft.graph.fido2AuthenticationMethod","true","false")
| summarize all = dcount(upn_s) , WH4Bc = countif(WH4B=="true"), TAPc = countif(TAP=="true"), APPc = countif(APP=="true"), SMSc = countif(SMS=="true"), FIDOc = countif(FIDO=="true") by length
| render timechart  with (title="Users with successfull MFA registration", legend=visible, yaxis=linear, ytitle="users", xtitle="time", kind=unstacked )
